name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hex: Tooltip - Tooltips for Dead By Daylight

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tooltips for Dead by Daylight anywhere on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hex: Tooltip puts everything about Dead by Daylight on any web page you visit. Ever find yourself trying to follow a conversation about Dead by Daylight and can't seem to? Hex: Tooltip is for you. Just install and it'll automatically recognize perks, items, addons, killers, survivors, and offerings, showing a helpful tooltip with information just like in-game. No more manually searching to find out what things do, just hover your mouse over the name.
